name: Sushi Clickers (the Cookie saga)
description:
After the great success of Cookie Clickers, now on your iPhone, iPod and iPad has arrived.... SUSHI Clickers!

Be prepared for endless hours of fun and entertainment!

The game is very simple:
- Make as many maki as you can by clicking or tapping on a giant Onigiri as fast as you can.
- As soon as you have enough maki take a trip to the shop and use your maki to buy upgrades to make maki even quicker!

Suhi Clickers seemingly endless gameplay will allow you to play for an indefinite amount of time, or at least until you make such as an extraordinary amount of maki, your device will not be able to count them anymore.

Become the Sushi Clickers Master.... be the first to make 1 BILLION maki!

Don't waste time... play now, your friends have already started and you need to catch up…. Quick!

*** GAMECENTER enabled for Maki Leaderboard! ***
